snippet: The deal will give the Russian state oil company Rosneft a 50 percent stake and allow the Italian private equity firm Clessidra to exit its investment. Marco Tronchetti Provera, Pirelli’s chairman and chief executive, will remain head of the...
abstract: The deal will give the Russian state oil company Rosneft a 50 percent stake and allow the Italian private equity firm Clessidra to exit its investment. Marco Tronchetti Provera, Pirelli’s chairman and chief executive, will remain head of the company.

headline.main: Rosneft to Take Stake in Pirelli Owner
